name: Learn Music Notes
description: * Input modes: Buttons or Piano * Score history (Youll see quickly how much you improve!) * Practice treble and bass clef, or just one of them, as you like * Three difficulty levels (the harder, the more notes with ledger lines youll get) *  and  accidentals * Source code of this app is open-sourced at https://github.com/MelvilQ/noten-lernen
